attributes.action: Ignore the petition for a 2nd EU re-referendum,
attributes.additional_details: Ignore the petition for a 2nd EU re-referendum, unless there is a 52% or over uk citizenship petitioners signatures or equivalent to 17.5 million signatures to over rule the 1st referendum . As the first EU referendum was a fare and just referendum.
attributes.background: We as uk citizens find that a Second EU referendum, will only put our great nation and parliament  in doubt and loss of respect to our electoral ways our great nation vote. The EU referendum on the 23rd of June 2016 was fare and just win in favour to leave the EU with a 1half million Extra votes.
